actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Revenue Act of 1978 to delay until December 31, 1980, the effective date of the provision providing for advance payment of the earned income credit.

summary.text: Amends the Revenue Act of 1978 to delay until December 31, 1980, the effective date of the provision providing for advance payment of the earned income credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Revenue Act of 1978 to delay until December 31, 1980, the effective date of the provision providing for advance payment of the earned income credit.
